# Example messages #
```{r messages_print}
print('this is a print')
```
```{r messages_cat}
cat('this is a cat\n')
```
```{r messages_message}
message('this is a message')
```
```{r messages_error, error=TRUE}
stop('this is an error')
```
```{r messages_warning}
warning('this is a warning')
```
```{r messages_all, error=TRUE}
print('this is a print')
cat('this is a cat\n')
message('this is a message')
warning('this is a warning')
stop('this is an error')
```
